reviewtext: This is my second pair of PortaPro 'phones, and my third pair of headphones using these drivers. They may just be the best headphones I've ever owned- they're not perfect, but they have proven sturdy, they travel well, and they sound great. No kidding; the only headphones I've used that sounded better were the expensive Bose noise-cancelling sort, so I consider this money well spent.Drawbacks: A little pricey. I bought the first pair for under $25 on a competing site, so you might do better with another vendor. The steel band can be a little uncomfortable, but hasn't been for me.Bottom line, these are a great buy and I look forward to using them for a long, long, long time.
